data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yoshiro Imamura has awarded Kashima a corner.
Kashima are pushing forward but Juan Alano's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Cerezo's Naoyuki Fujita misses with an attempt on goal.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Hiroshi Kiyotake (Cerezo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 8, Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo just outside Kashima's area.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Cerezo's area.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Kashima drives forward and Everaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 16, Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima are caught offside.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Kashima drive upfield and Kento Misao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Cerezo.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 29, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Cerezo.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kashima.
Kento Misao (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 38, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 41, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Free kick Kashima.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kashima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Cerezo make their first substitution with Riku Matsuda replacing Toshiyuki Takagi.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Kashima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 47, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Ayase Ueda's header is off-target for Kashima.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 54, Ryota Nagaki for Kashima drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 56, Ryota Nagaki (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Yoichiro Kakitani replacing Yuta Toyokawa.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Zago (Kashima) is making a first substitution, with Rikuto Hirose replacing Ryota Nagaki.
In the minute 65, Cerezo's Yoichiro Kakitani breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
The away team have replaced Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with Yusuke Maruhashi. This is the third substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Juan Alano (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 75, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Juan Alano with Yuta Matsumura.
Yasushi Endo is on a sub for Kento Misao for Kashima.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Cerezo.
Ryotaro Araki is replacing Shoma Doi for the home team.
In Kashima Cerezo drive forward through Yoichiro Kakitani. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Yasushi Endo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 83, Cerezo push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Yoichiro Kakitani gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashima defence.
Goal! Riku Matsuda gives Cerezo a 0-1 lead in Kashima.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Cerezo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Kashima surge into the attack at Kashima Soccer Stadium but Everaldoâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 87, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Ken Tokura is on a sub for Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo.
Kashima attack but Everaldo's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Yoshiro Imamura will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In Kashima, Ayase Ueda of Kashima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Tomoya Inukai of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Everaldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Goal! Everaldo equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
